hero.title: Cracked screen? We'll fix it today
hero.subtitle: Same-day repairs for iPhone and Android. Most repairs done in 30-60 minutes while you wait. Walk-ins welcome! Lifetime warranty on all parts. Get your phone back to perfect condition.

about.title: Expert Phone Repair
about.subtitle: Fast, affordable, guaranteed
about.content: QuickFix specializes in smartphone repairs for all major brands. With certified technicians, quality parts, and fast turnaround, we're your neighborhood phone repair experts. Most repairs completed in under an hour!

products.name: iPhone Screen Replacement
products.description: Replace cracked or damaged iPhone screen. Premium quality glass. Done in 30-60 minutes. Lifetime warranty.

products.name: Samsung Screen Replacement
products.description: Galaxy screen repair with OEM-quality parts. Fast service. Lifetime warranty on parts.

products.name: Battery Replacement
products.description: New battery for iPhone or Android. Fix battery drain issues. Done while you wait.

products.name: Charging Port Repair
products.description: Fix charging port issues. No more wiggling the cable. Quick turnaround.

products.name: Water Damage Repair
products.description: Water damage diagnostics and repair. Bring your phone in ASAP for best results.

products.name: Back Glass Replacement
products.description: Replace shattered back glass. Restore your phone's look. Quality replacement glass.

items.text: Cracked my iPhone screen and they fixed it in 30 minutes! Looks brand new and the price was way better than the Apple Store. Highly recommend!
items.author: Jessica M.
items.title: Local Customer

items.text: My phone fell in water and I thought it was done. They saved it! Fast service, fair price, and super friendly. My new go-to repair shop.

items.title: Satisfied Customer

items.text: Best phone repair place! Fixed my charging port same day. No appointment needed. Professional service and lifetime warranty. 5 stars!
